hobbyPlan.title: Hobby Plan
hobbyPlan.description: Free for personal use. Perfect to get started and get a feel for it.
features: Monitor all water parameters (e.g., pH level, temperature, salinity, etc.)
Access to the free app with real-time data visualization

advancedPlan.title: Advanced Plan
advancedPlan.description: Advanced monitoring tools for precise water tracking with alerts and more environments.
features: Upload values every 3 hours for accurate tracking
Add notifications and alarms for specific water parameters

premiumPlan.title: Premium Plan
premiumPlan.description: Perfect for professional aquarists with many environments and AI functions.
features: Everything from the Hobby and Advanced Plans
Upload water values every 30 minutes for precise monitoring

privacy.title: Privacy Policy

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.text: At Aquaware, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal data is handled with care. This privacy policy outlines how we collect, store, and use your information.

infoWeCollect.title: 2. Information We Collect
infoWeCollect.description: We collect the following types of personal information:

personalInfo.title: Personal Information:
personalInfo.text: When creating an account, we collect your email, first name, last name, and password.

waterData.title: Water Data:
waterData.text: Water quality data such as temperature, pH, and other parameters are stored and used within the service.

cookies.title: Cookies:
cookies.text: We use cookies to manage session tokens and remember your login status. Cookies are stored securely and contain no sensitive information.

useOfInfo.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
useOfInfo.description: Your personal data is used for the following purposes:
useOfInfo.purpose1: To manage your account and provide our services.
useOfInfo.purpose2: To monitor water data and provide analytics through the platform.
useOfInfo.purpose3: To ensure secure login using hashed passwords and session cookies.
useOfInfo.purpose4: To communicate with you regarding updates or changes to the service.

thirdParty.title: 4. Third-Party Login & Cookies
thirdParty.googleLogin: We offer login via Google. If you choose to log in using Google, we only access your basic profile information and email to create and manage your account.
thirdParty.cookiesUsage: We use cookies to store session tokens. These cookies help us authenticate users and ensure that your session remains active. They are stored securely and automatically expire when you log out or after a set period.

dataRetention.title: 5. Data Retention & Deletion
dataRetention.text1: We retain your personal data for as long as your account is active. Upon deletion of your account, all personal data will be permanently deleted, and water data will be anonymized and unlinked from your account.
dataRetention.text2: You can request data deletion or account termination at any time by contacting us at

dataSecurity.title: 6. Data Security
dataSecurity.text: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data. Passwords are hashed, and sensitive information is encrypted. Access to user data is restricted to authorized personnel only.

policyChanges.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
policyChanges.text: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy as needed to reflect changes in our service or legal requirements. Any significant updates will be communicated to you via email or within the platform.

privacy.contactUs: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy, please contact us at

terms.title: Terms and Conditions

overview.title: 1. Overview
overview.text: Aquaware is a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) platform offering water monitoring and analysis tools. By using Aquaware, you agree to the terms outlined below.

subscription.title: 2. Subscription and Payments
subscription.description: Aquaware operates on a monthly subscription model. Payments are processed through PayPal.

paymentMethod.title: Payment Method:
paymentMethod.text: Subscriptions are charged monthly via PayPal.

noRefunds.title: No Refunds:
noRefunds.text: Once payment is made, no refunds will be provided.

cancellation.title: Cancellation:
cancellation.text: Cancellation will take effect at the end of the current billing cycle.

documentation.title: 3. Documentation
documentation.text: All functionalities and instructions for using the service are documented and accessible via our

userData.title: 4. User Data & Privacy

accountCreation.title: Account Creation:
accountCreation.text: User data, including email and password, is securely stored. Passwords are hashed and protected according to industry standards.

dataAnonymization.title: Data Anonymization on Deletion:
dataAnonymization.text: Upon account deletion, personal data is removed, and water data is anonymized.

userData.moreDetails: For more details, refer to our

thirdPartyLogin.title: 5. Third-Party Login
thirdPartyLogin.text: Aquaware provides the option to log in using Google. Cookies will be set to manage authentication tokens.
thirdPartyLogin.cookieInfo: For more information on cookies, review our

terms.contactUs: For additional questions, contact us at

accountInfo.title: Account Settings
accountInfo.noRefreshToken: No refresh token available. Please log in again.

pricingPlanInfo.title: Plan Information
pricingPlanInfo.paymentInstruction: We use Stripe for payment processing. Please ensure you use the same email address that you have registered with through our API, app, or on this website to complete your payment. This will help ensure your account is correctly linked with your subscription.
